target.code:
from sympy import primerange

def calculate_remainder(n, m):
    primes = list(primerange(1, 100))  # get prime numbers below 100
    sum_of_primes = sum(primes[:n])  # sum of the first n primes
    return sum_of_primes % primes[m-1]  # remainder when divided by mth prime
target.description: Calculate the remainder of the sum of the first n primes divided by the mth prime.
target.name: calculate_remainder

target.description: Calculate the fraction of a total based on a percentage and total amount.
target.name: calculate_fraction_of_total
